metadata.description: Regex representing container images allowed in Kubernetes cluster. E.g. Regex of azure container registry images is ^.+azurecr.io/.+$
Enable or disable the execution of the policy

properties.displayName: [Limited Preview]: [AKS] Ensure only allowed container images in AKS
properties.description: This policy ensures only allowed container images are running in an Azure Kubernetes Service cluster. Limited Preview policies only work for registered subscriptions. To register, please go to https://aka.ms/akspolicyonboarding. For instruction on using this policy, please go to https://aka.ms/akspolicydoc.
